I want to plot the following polynomial:               6.09125E15 - 1.12464E16*x^1 + 1.35607E16*x^2 + -1.73465E16*x^3 + 2.6004E16*x^4 -        2.65074E16*x^5 + 1.55669E16*x^6 + -5.1382E15 *x^7 + 8.90337E14*x^8 - 6.31447E13*x^9      for the following set of x values > 0.10674, 0.11393 , 0.1216, 0.1298, 0.13854, 0.14788, 0.15784, 0.16847, > 0.17982, 0.19194, 0.20487, 0.21867, 0.23341, 0.24913, 0.26591, 0.28383, > 0.30295, 0.32336, 0.34515, 0.3684, 0.39322, 0.41972, 0.44799, 0.47818, > 0.51039, 0.54478, 0.58148, 0.62066, 0.66247, 0.70711, 0.75475, 0.8056, > 0.85987, 0.9178, 0.97964, 1.04564, 1.11609, 1.19128, 1.27154, 1.35721, > 1.44865, 1.54625, 1.65042, 1.76162, 1.8803, 2.00698, 2.1422, 2.28653, > 2.44058, 2.605, 2.78051, 2.96784, 3.16779, 3.38122, 3.60902, 3.85217, > 4.1117, 4.38872, 4.6844 I also want to get the corresponding y values. How can this be done? Please suggest a method.
